item.description:
Dear Larrikins,

The silly season is almost upon us, its time to get in touch with your inner Santa. To celebrate we are doing a joint Commonwealth holiday party with the Canadian, British and Kiwi expat groups. The venue is Kings, the perfect location for a festive drink, a few games of pool and some vigorous debate about the relevance of the Commonwealth Games. We'll meet in the bar area and then get the games going.

Hope you can make it.

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Commonwealth holiday party at Kings
